name: Real Property Management Teyata
address: 119 N Commercial St Suite 910, Bellingham, WA 98225

google_reviews.author: Sophia Bentz
google_reviews.review: Kalli Hyde has been very unprofessional and harassing at times. It was the WORST rental experience weve had. Rude and only was responsive at the very end, during our rental period she lacked communication the entire time, took days for our septic issues, never gave us 24 hour notice when a person came over, never fixed the things she said would be fixed/replaced and shes been extremely unprofessional and unpleasant in the end of our rental period, texting us rude comments often. Do not recommend dealing with her.

google_reviews.author: Ann Haggenmacher
google_reviews.review: Carrie is amazing!! She is very knowledgeable and detail oriented. If we have a question or request she responds within a reasonable amount of time. Carrie is the opposite of most PMs and that's a great thing. We've recommended her to our friend who isn't happy with their current PM company.

owner_response.text: Carrie is very thankful for your kind words and recommendations, Ann!

google_reviews.author: Bryan Forsloff
google_reviews.review: Carrie has been fantastic to work with. We are renting due to a major remodel on our house. It has been stressful but Carrie has made the rental piece of our adventure stress-free.

owner_response.text: Carrie, we are so grateful for your kind words!

google_reviews.author: Nary Tep Michaud
google_reviews.review:
We will never rent a property through RPMT - Teyata, if, I have to deal with Kalli Hyde again. She was only available and went above and beyond when we wanted to rent a property. After renting, it was like we were put on the back burner and forgotten.

We have placed six maintenance requests; two were completed and one we figured ourselves. Two of the same maintenance requests placed; first request completed but the second request was never followed up by the property manager. One of the request, the request was followed up and we sent pictures regarding the issue but no response after that.

When sending emails to Kalli, either she took more than 72 hours or never responds. When my husband was able to get a hold of her on the phone, you can tell by her tone of voice that she was frustrated and annoyed of him. If, she doesn't want to continue to provide good customer service, then she needs to be replace by someone who can.

owner_response.text:
I'm sorry to hear about your experience with our company and understand your concerns. The way that we process work orders heavily relies on tenants submitting those through the work order system we have in place. 

I took a look into all of the work orders submitted during your tenancy from most recent to oldest: 

1. Outdoor hose bib: 4/16 tenant submitted work order in the system, on 4/19 vendor supplied estimate. Due to your work schedules, and your upcoming move out, it was agreed upon and voiced immediately to please not use that hose bib and vendor will take care of it upon your move out. Considering it was less than a month out. 

2. Kitchen counter water spot repair: 8/17 tenant submitted, we contacted the vendor immediately, they put it on their schedule for end of September. Considering this was not an urgent maintenance request, we worked off the vendors schedule. 

3. Lower bathroom leak: 9/15 tenant submitted, on 9/18 vendor supplied us with estimate, plumber coordinated with tenant and owner directly and completed from there. 

4. Light chain broken on ceiling fan: 11/30 tenant submitted, on 12/12 vendor supplied estimate, on 12/14 we informed you that owner has decided since the light still worked without the chain, there was no need to move forward with repair. 

5. Dishwasher not draining: 11/30 tenant submitted, on 12/04 vendor confirmed scheduled, notice was sent to you as tenants same day, 12/19 vendor came out. 

6. Light switch broken: 
11/30 tenant submitted, 12/05 owner approved repair,
12/19 vendor completed repair

7. Fireplace gas insert not working (did not work even prior to tenants moving in, and that was voiced to the tenants): 12/08 tenant submitted, 12/19 estimate given by vendor, 12/20 voiced to tenant that the owner has decided to not move forward with this repair at this current time. 

We understand your concerns, although we have a direct maintenance line via our company phone line that would direct you to our maintenance team in the event Kalli was unavailable, or a work order was sent directly to her. 

If you have any further questions regarding the maintenance concerns during your tenancy, please go ahead and reach out to us to chat about them at any time. 

Best of luck to you and your family, 
The Teyata Team.

google_reviews.author: Klara Mirek
google_reviews.review: Carrie is amazing! She's caring, attentive, responsive, and will answer all your important questions giving you the clarity you need. She's very knowledgable. I had a few important questions regarding multifamily residentials and she answered those with ease. Highly recommend her and RPM to anyone needing a property management company and real estate agent to facilitate the process through.

google_reviews.author: Reilly Desmul
google_reviews.review: Kalli has been an absolute pleasure to work with, and consistently goes above and beyond to ensure our needs are met. Overall, this has been a fantastic property management company! Responsiveness to requests are always timely, efficient, and handled expeditiously.

google_reviews.author: Sam Matthews
google_reviews.review: I rented a property managed by RPMT from October 2020-October 2023 and was pleased with and appreciated their professional management practices. They were cooperative scheduling annual inspections and showings to accommodate my availability. Carrie, the agent who assisted me with all matter of issues as I prepared to leave at the end of my lease, couldn't have been more helpful.

google_reviews.author: john swanson
google_reviews.review: Terrible property management.. Started out great but once our original property manager left the company it has been all downhill. Both the tenant and myself have gone weeks without return calls from our supposed property manager. When we finally hear back it is one excuse after the other from lost phone to locked out of emails, to never got any messages and so on. Once we reached out to the renters the many made up stories didn't add up. Unprofessional and dishonest. If you are looking for a property manager save yourself some headache and keep looking

owner_response.text:
John, 

Thank you for reaching out. We apologize for the troubles you feel are an issue here. As a company, we strive to ensure we keep an open line of communication between us and the owners, and us as the tenants. However, keep in mind that your tenants have not voiced anything along the lines of these concerns to us, as they have utilized all parties involved to get in contact with if your property manager is unavailable. I am sorry you feel as if we have been dishonest. Just to point out that this all started with your assumptions of the previous tenant being responsible for replacing the appliances, where as that was not expressed to us, nor in the previous lease agreement with the old tenants. When the time came, and we had to get a new appliance is when most of your concerns arose, and you stopped communicating to us. I understand how you may feel as though in that situation we are being dishonest, and truly apologize for making it seem as that or making excuses, where as our intent is to layout all info for you whether or not it is something you wanted to hear. Sometimes that may be letting you know what came up in a certain situation, but that line of communication will always be there if you are opening to communicating with us. 
Please feel free to reach out to us via text or call for further assistance.

google_reviews.author: Rob Scofidio
google_reviews.review:
We started using RPM Teyata in January of 2021, slowly transferring properties to them throughout the year.  We intentionally waited to review RPM until we had been working with them for a year.  With 9 units now under their management and a year's worth of experience with them, we can honestly say that we would strongly recommend them!

Kellie is an absolute pleasure to work with! She is very professional, communication is great, and she genuinely has our best interest at heart and cares about taking the best care of our properties and our tenants, both of which are very important to us.  We feel confident having her represent us.

Eric handles the billing side and is also great to work with.  He is pleasant, knowledgeable, and professional.  Rental deposits are consistently on time and accurate.  Questions are always addressed and either clarified or resolved without having to repeatedly revisit and waste time, which we really appreciate.

We have self-managed for about 12 years and had reached a point where, with personal obligations, it was just too much.  We tried another company first, but the knowledge and experience of the support staff was lacking and inconsistent, communication was poor, accounting was unintelligible at times, and follow-through was awful.  Mistakes are to be expected in life (from us as well), but the key with RPM has been great communication and consistent and competent execution of whatever task is at hand.

We have been very pleased with Kellie and RPM Teyata and the load they have taken off of us.  Thank you, Kellie!!

Rob and Angie Scofidio

google_reviews.author: Lata Evarts
google_reviews.review: Weve been clients of Teyata Management for a year and a half. Kellie Strong was our original PM who we were very pleased with.  Since her departure, Logan has become our PM. Logan is attentive to our needs and concerns as well as the needs of our tenants. As out of state owners, we feel comfortable and confident with Logan managing our property. Recently, we became aware of a significant problem with an appliance at our property. Logan went above and beyond and worked with the appliance company which resulted in a successful outcome for us as well as our tenants. We consider ourselves fortunate to have Logan as our PM.

owner_response.text: Lata thank you so much for being a great owner to work with!

google_reviews.author: Austyn Tittle
google_reviews.review: Kalli has been a dream to work with. She is extremely quick to respond and goes above and beyond to care for my property. Because of her, this endeavor has been so easy for me. I wish I found her sooner.

google_reviews.author: Brad Connie Doerksen
google_reviews.review: Kellie and her team have done a fantastic job for us. What a relief to know that our property is being taken care of while we are stuck on the other side of the border unable to get there.  We love our little place and Kellie has laid all our concerns to rest. They provide pics so that you can see exactly what it looks like inside and out. And the detail she provides is incredible. She has also done many little extra things at no cost and has actually really acted as an owner in her care for our place and fixed and put back little things like it was a place that she loved herself. We highly recommend using her service.  The prices are reasonable for what they provide. We still miss our little place so much but now are resting easy that it is being taken care of for us while we cannot.

owner_response.text: Connie & Brad, thank you so much for the beautiful recommendation of us here at Real Property Management Teyata! I have so enjoyed working with you guys and it has been my pleasure to keep an eye on your lovely vacation home and I'm excited to continue our working relationship as long as you need me I am here! ...& of course when that border opens we will get to meet in person!

google_reviews.author: Donna Brown
google_reviews.review:
I contacted Kellie through her website and she was very prompt at getting back to me. As it turned out her company is not able to accomplish my needs due to our location etc. HOWEVER, Kellie got right on the phone with one of her contacts in my area and set up an introduction with an agency that maybe able to help me.
I was very impressed that Kellie took the time to help me and get the ball rolling! Excellent phone and email skills!
Thank you so very much Kellie!

owner_response.text: Donna you are so very welcome!! I am glad I was able to be of assistance. If you or anyone you know ever need our help, all you gotta do is call!! :) Real Property Management Teyata thanks you for taking the time to give us such a lovely review!!

google_reviews.author: Connor Swift
google_reviews.review: I have been renting a home from RPM Teyata for a year now and it has been a wonderful experience. Our property manager, Kalli, has been helpful, attentive and takes our questions/concerns very seriously. Kalli and RPM Teyata is very professional in every aspect of their business practices. I will not use any other property management company in the future!

owner_response.text: Hi Connor. Thank you so much for leaving Kalli this awesome review. The Teyata team is appreciative of all of our amazing tenants!

google_reviews.author: Grace Stiles
google_reviews.review: They have great properties but sadly the office and staff will never call you back or fix anything if it breaks. I had a broken smelly dishwasher for 3-4 months and I got a call about fixing the thing AFTER I moved out of the property. They dont send receipts from work they said they had done after I moved out. Didnt give me back my security deposit after I left the house spotless, and had it all professionally cleaned. Carpets and all

google_reviews.author: Rad Floria
google_reviews.review: Kellie is an absolute Rockstar. If your looking for a PM to rent your property look no further! Shes a manager who has your best intentions in mind and puts your time and agenda first. Extremely professional and easy to work with. I would highly recommend her to anyone I know in the business of buy and hold real estate.

google_reviews.author: Kanishk Sharma
google_reviews.review:
If you are looking for someone to manage your property- Eric is your guy ! Really easy to speak with and always available, no matter what time you call. Had really wonderful experience with Eric in managing our rental property.

He was able to take care of the entire renting process for us right from the current tenants moving out to the new tenants moving in. He and his team handled in the entire transition seamlessly end to end with really Professional, trustworthy, proactive and transparent service.

We spoke with several companies when we were looking around for company to handle our property. And Were so glad and grateful we found  Eric & the Real property Management team who is so committed to help its customers out !

We guys highly recommend Eric and Real Property Management to anyone needing a property manager.

google_reviews.author: Andrea Balzotti
google_reviews.review: Kellie Strong is the best! She used to work at my husbands office and had a great reputation for high ethics and great customer service, and we refer everyone to them now. She is super professional and responsive.  Highly recommend!

owner_response.text: Andrea, thank you so much for your recommendation, I sincerely appreciate it and your gracious words!!

google_reviews.author: Paul Cunningham
google_reviews.review: We worked with Kellie Strong in getting into a rental home in Lynden. She was quick in her responses, informative, and accommodating. Since we couldn't be there in person, she gave us a virtual tour of the property and was quick to point out any marks on walls, floors, etc., which put us at ease. Can't recommend highly enough!

owner_response.text: We appreciate you taking the time to submit a review for us at Real Property Management Teyata!! Paul I can't wait to meet you and your family in person, I am so glad you are coming to the area and super happy to have helped with your peace of mind in having a secured place to call home when you arrive!  Welcome to the Teyata Family!

google_reviews.author: Von Schroeder
google_reviews.review: We would recommend this company and Kellie to our best friend.  She really cares about her clients and goes that extra mile to ensure a great outcome.  Kellie is very knowledgeable, professional and responsive.  We feel really lucky that we found her.

owner_response.text: Von, thank you so much for your recommendation and your lovely words! I so enjoyed meeting you and Chris and I am looking forward to working with you in the near future!

google_reviews.author: Amanda Gain
google_reviews.review:
Update:
8449 Moonlight Ave in Blaine. I don't recommend staying here or renting from this property management. They raised the rent after a year, plus raised it another $500 when we left. They took pretty much our entire security deposit. They charged an exorbitant fee for landscaping even though when we first arrived, the yard was just a sand pit and invasive blackberry. I took time to plant native plants and clover but they still decided to charge about $600 from the deposit for that. They hire the cheapest labor possible so cabinets just fell apart, fridge stopped working, the paint job was horrible.

Pipes froze and burst both summers. Our neighbor helped us out with that and said that whoever did the plumbing did a terrible job.

owner_response.text: Amanda thank you so much for sharing your experience renting from us!

google_reviews.author: Britney's Bullet Journal
google_reviews.review: Weve lived in this property for three months and locked ourselves out of our unit. We called the office, around 6:30 at night, and they were able to come out to us in under 30 minutes. They saved us a locksmith bill! Very grateful for their help.

google_reviews.author: Navdeep sandhu
google_reviews.review:
Kellie is so professional and responsible. She managed everything with timely. She always happy and welcome you with  face. We are so lucky because we find Kellie as real property management teyata. She gives us solutions for every problem and manage our property for lease.
Best of luck for your future 
Thanks for your hard work.

owner_response.text: Thank You Navdeep, your comments made me smile big!!   I appreciate you trusting me and Real Property Management Teyata with your Investment and I am so happy to have found us the perfect tenant as well! I look forward to working with you and your wonderful family for a long time!!

google_reviews.author: Breanne Thompson
google_reviews.review: Real Property Management Teyata did a great job at helping us find our condo. They were quick and reliable with sending us listings and thorough with any questions we had. I also really appreciated the personal help in doing a video walk through for us when we werent available to view certain places. They also helped to make the application process easy and we got into our condo pretty quickly! Ill definitely be using them again in the future when were ready to move again!

owner_response.text: That's awesome Breanne! We're here to help! Thank you for using Real Property Management Teyata!

google_reviews.author: Molly Visser
google_reviews.review:
Kellie is everything youre looking for in a professional. She knows the business well, its professional and truly cares about her clients. It is obviously her top priority to communicate clearly and often. I feel like hes around her and confident that I am well taken care of. She provides excellent customer service.
Molly Visser

owner_response.text: Molly Visser, we here at Real Property Management Teyata appreciate you taking the time to write this review. I think the world of you & have a lot of respect for you and your business as well. I look forward to working with you  on many more projects!

google_reviews.author: Brandi Kincaid
google_reviews.review: Such a great team to work with! Responsive, thorough, and kind, they bring ease the process, helping ensure the best care for the renters and property. Its not often one thinks of ease when it comes to property management, but they make that possible.

google_reviews.author: Luis Sepulveda
google_reviews.review:
I've done some work with the people powering Real Property Management Teyata before. My experience with Lawton Coursey was A++ in the past while acquiring real state. Since I was on the need for property management services after dealing with other company fails I've contacted him and we started working together. It was night and day difference. I wish I had done this before and avoided all the headaches I had with the other company.
Right now, they're leasing my property. Three words to describe their service are professional, reliable and responsive. It gives me that hands off investment mindset so I worry more about life and not tenants.
I find the quality of the service you get for the pricing is unmatched in the area. I'm very happy to continue to do business with Lawton Coursey and Teyata as my one stop shop for real state asset acquisition and management.

owner_response.text: Hey Luis, it was wonderful working with you as well and really appreciate your review. Myself and the entire Real Property Management Teyata team look forward to assisting you with any needs moving forward!

google_reviews.author: Provoke206DJ
google_reviews.review: Kellie was amazing! She got us into a fantastic property and was very kind and explained the process entirely. Would 100% recommend Kellie and this company anytime! Give them a chance!! You wont regret it!

owner_response.text: Thanks you guys, so much!! I am seriously going to enjoy working with you both and I am delighted to have you as new tenants with us here at Real Property Management Teyata in Bellingham!

google_reviews.author: Eesh W.
google_reviews.review: I wasn't familiar with the local area and needed a decently priced, dog-friendly apartment in a safe neighborhood as soon as possible. The folks over at RPM were fantastic at communicating leads and were always available whenever I had questions. They're professionals at what they do and never made me feel ignorant for knowing little about renting in that area. I highly recommend them and know that I wouldn't have gotten into a fantastic apartment within a short period of time, if I hadn't engaged their services. Thanks, guys. :)

owner_response.text: You are so welcome Eesh! Thank you for the review of Real Property Management Teyata!

google_reviews.author: Nello Bottari
google_reviews.review: Immediate, LIVE consultation with an extremely articulate, thoroughly knowledgeable, clearly experienced professional. Gave me an unhurried  clinic on all aspects of property management. Thoroughly answered all my questions. I look forward to working with Kellie in the near future!

google_reviews.author: Bill Petrozzi
google_reviews.review: My wife and I are very pleased with  Kellie's performance and prompt response.  She met our expectations  in every sense of the word  showing understanding and patience  with  people who had never hired a Property Manager before

google_reviews.author: Hunter Camfield
google_reviews.review: I honestly wouldn't have any other company deal with managing my properties. Lawton was so professional and trustworthy. He was fair with his pricing and his communication through the whole process was impeccable. My tenants also loved dealing with him. Don't call anyone else!

owner_response.text: Hey Hunter, thank you so much for your kind words. Truly a pleasure working with you and looking forward to a lasting business relationship.

google_reviews.author: sam denny
google_reviews.review: Lawton and real property management Teyata did a great job recently leasing two of my apartment units. We achieved our target rent amounts with solid tenants.  I was impressed with the through tenant screening. Lawton is responsive and always available. Highly recommend Lawton and real property management Teyata!

google_reviews.author: Larry Greene
google_reviews.review: Kellie has been most helpful and supportive from the very beginning in working with us as tenants.  She listens to any concerns we may have and responds quickly to them.

google_reviews.author: Clarissa Vinciguerra
google_reviews.review: Real Property Management Teyata was a referral from our realtor, and they didn't disappoint! They provided excellent and detailed advice about investment in real estate and leasing to tenants. Staff was consistently responsive and helpful.

owner_response.text: Hi Clarissa, thank you so much for the review. Our team really enjoyed working with you through the initial process and look forward to helping you with your real estate needs moving forward!

google_reviews.author: Ian Joseph
google_reviews.review: I've worked with Lawton Coursey for over 4 years. He's helped with investment real estate, purchasing, selling, remodeling and management. He truly is a "one stop shop" for all things investment real estate. Lawton is reliable, knowledgeable, and has a high level of integrity. I highly recommend him.

google_reviews.author: Christen Solberg
google_reviews.review: I have worked with Lawton for two years and he is wonderful.  He cares about people and making things right.  His compassion and enthusiasm is infectious.  I highly recommend him to manage your property!

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Christen!

google_reviews.author: Dennis VanBeek
google_reviews.review: Your in great hands with Kellie Strong, she has many years of experience in real estate and property management while providing professional first rate customer service.

owner_response.text: Thank you Dennis! I have a great partnership here with Real Property Management Teyata and I am eager to share our services!

google_reviews.author: Heather Stevenson
google_reviews.review: Kellie is the utmost professional! She always keeps up on education and research and knows her stuff. I really appreciate her friendly personality while always be a true professional!

owner_response.text: Heather!!! You are so awesome and I thank you very much for your kind words! I appreciate you so much and can't wait to work with you again!

google_reviews.author: Jolyn Henry
google_reviews.review: Unprofessional, unresponsive, lied multiple times to my face, and continued to enable my landlord to blatantly break the law and attempt to exploit me. No follow-up on a number of sensitive issues such as known mold in the unit. Do NOT rent from these people if you can avoid it.

google_reviews.author: Michele Vest
google_reviews.review:
Kellie is such a pleasure to work with on a professional level. I definitely will recommend her for future needs.
Michele-Chem Dry of Bellingham

owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your review of Real Property Management Teyata!! We enjoy working with you and I am thankful for the good service you guys bring to our clients!

google_reviews.author: J Middleton
google_reviews.review: Eric and Kelly are fabulous! They are on top of everything all the time. I am so grateful to have them manage our property and highly recommend them! Thanks so much. Kam and Nevin Middleton

owner_response.text: Kam & Nevin, we think you're pretty fabulous as well!! Thank you so much for your recommendation of Real Property Management Teyata!

google_reviews.author: Suave B
google_reviews.review: My experience with Real Property Management Teyata has been top notch. Always professional, caring and delivering what was agreed upon. I recommend them to all.

owner_response.text: Suave, how wonderful of you to take the time to recommend us here at Real Property Management Teyata! I make it my personal goal to make sure we will continue to be worthy of your respect. Thank you so much!!

google_reviews.author: Kathryn Abrams
google_reviews.review: Very unresponsive company.  Would give negative 5 stars if I could.  Lack of communication and unresponsive.  Terrible experience with them.

google_reviews.author: Herb Cahoon
google_reviews.review: We requested and contracted for specific services and have received a report from the  supplier that all of  the conditions have been met and the service completed.  This has been done in a timely manner and a reasonable expense.  We have paid the invoice.

owner_response.text: Mr. Cahoon, thank you so much for trusting us and I'm so glad you were pleased! Maybe when the border opens back up we'll have the pleasure of meeting you and your family in person! If we can help with any property management needs, just call!

google_reviews.author: Robert Favaro
google_reviews.review: I have used Real Property Management Teyata on several occasions to help me with some home management services and I have been extremely pleased with the professionalism and excellent quality of service. I highly recommend Real Property Management Teyata.

owner_response.text: Thank you so very much Mr. Favaro!! We enjoy working with you and I'm so glad you have chosen us as your 'go-to'  company for your property Management needs!

google_reviews.author: Jennifer Morris
google_reviews.review: If you are considering this company for property management - skip it - the worst mgmt experience in 10 years - no management - breach of ageement- funds not paid - security deposits not paid - its a long list .....FYI

owner_response.text:
Jennifer,
 
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are truly sorry in how this has played out, and is being perceived. However, the water coming into the basement and the necessary mold remediation were not our fault. We worked with you and the tenants to the best of our ability during the 5 months we managed your property.  We realize that you were unaware about the foundation issues that caused the primary bedroom and bathroom to be unusable to the tenants. This left both parties in an unideal situation as the tenants could not use/occupy part of their rental property, and you did not have the financial backing to support that fix at that moment. Per your email to the tenants (which we have, and can happily share), you agreed to let them out of their lease as well as agreed to refund all of their previous rent payments and entire security deposit. After they moved out, you changed your mind about this agreement and would not refund them. Taking this information into account and referring to your original email with the tenants, there was no fraud on our part. We then gave you all the rent we collected from the tenants from the date they moved in to the date they moved out (minus our management fees). We also provided statements twice a month through the contract period accounting for all funds collected. Yes, we did refund the entire security deposit back to the tenants as you originally agreed to do. Honestly, I was shocked to see this review because you know how hard we worked to keep them from seeking legal action, and in the best interest for you. We understand that a rental property is a huge investment on your end (the owners), and I am sorry that this was not a positive experience for you. I sincerely regret any negative feelings you may have gained due to this experience, and genuinely appreciate your feedback, and please know that we take all feedback, good and bad, very seriously. We can only learn from these experiences and do better in the future. 

Kindest regards,
The Teyata Team.

google_reviews.author: Jon Delk
google_reviews.review: Easiest rental transaction Ive ever had, very professional, quick response time to messages, reasonable rental requirements, very courteous. Thank you for making our transition from one home to another so easy.

owner_response.text: Thank you Jon!

google_reviews.author: Joshua Berman
google_reviews.review: Logan is fantastic! Hes super helpful and goes above and beyond. I highly recommend Real Property Management Teyeta!

owner_response.text: Thanks so much for the review, Joshua Berman!

google_reviews.author: Madison Gregory
google_reviews.review: Working with kalli has been a pleasure, and I highly recommend using Real Property Management Teyata!

owner_response.text: Thank you Madison! Kalli and the team appreciate you!

google_reviews.author: Lyn & Sandi Stevenson
google_reviews.review: I found Kellie to be very interested in working for me to find a contractor to do the work we needed .She was very professional in her endeavor to do so . Robert Stevenson

owner_response.text: Mr. Stevenson, thank you so much for your feedback/review! From myself, and all of us here at Real Property Management Teyata, we value you as a client and we value your opinion of our services!

google_reviews.author: apmarketingdevelop
google_reviews.review: Professional and very attentive to my needs. Response quickly and is very resourceful. Highly recommend her services

google_reviews.author: Helen Nerini
google_reviews.review: Kalli has been professional, helpful answering concerns we had and working with us with us through this whole process.

owner_response.text: Helen Thank you for sharing your experience working with Kalli!

google_reviews.author: Blair Parkhurst
google_reviews.review: Professional, prompt service, excellent communicaitons, keeps track of details, wonderful person to deal with.

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Blair! I have enjoyed working with you. I'm honored that you would recommend us here at Real Property Management Teyata to all who may need our services as well!

google_reviews.author: Samanda Dillard
google_reviews.review: Friendly customer service, professional and caring company

google_reviews.author: Kody B.
google_reviews.review: So professional and always delivers no matter what the situation is!

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Kody!

google_reviews.author: Grace Nelson
google_reviews.review: Need to actually speak to a person!

owner_response.text: Thank you for your review!
Thank you, Madison!
Thank you, Matt!
Thank you, Krystal!
Alex, thank you so much for your 5 star tag! We at Real Property Management Teyata are so happy you are with us and I look forward to a long working relationship with you guys!
Thanks so much for the 5 star tag, Patrick! I hope you'll keep us here at Real Property Management Teyata in mind for all your property management needs!
Thank you for your trust in us here at Real Property Management Teyata, Mr. Callaghan!
Hello Ken! Thank you for giving Real Property Management Teyata & our Vacant Property Management services such an outstanding tag! We appreciate it!

summary.text:
Good

Real Property Management Teyata has received positive feedback for their attentive and professional service. Many users commend team members such as Kellie and Eric for their responsiveness and meticulous management of properties. Reviews highlight instances where the company efficiently managed transitions between tenants, handled maintenance issues promptly, and communicated effectively with property owners and renters. Clients have expressed satisfaction with RPM Teyata’s ability to provide peace of mind, especially for those living out of state. Their professional handling of complex situations and transparent communication appears to reassure clients, making them feel their investments are well looked after.

Great

Several reviews glowingly praise specific employees like Carrie, Kellie, and Lawton for their exceptional deeds. Carrie is noted to effortlessly reduce the stress of renting during home renovations, while Lawton is lauded for his reliability and expertise in managing investment properties. Clients describe RPM Teyata as a "one stop shop" due to the comprehensive service they receive, ranging from initial property tours to seamless management operations. Testimonials highlight a consistent theme of professionalism and competence, often noting how employees go the extra mile— whether it’s offering a virtual tour or handling emergencies with care and attention to detail. These gestures foster client loyalty and cultivate long-lasting business relationships.

Bad

Some users have reported negative experiences with specific team members at RPM Teyata, citing issues with communication and customer service. One common complaint involves difficulty getting timely responses to inquiries or maintenance requests, leading to frustration and dissatisfaction among tenants. Another user mentioned the delay and inconsistency in addressing maintenance concerns, such as broken appliances and leaks, which were often highlighted but resolved only after considerable delays or follow-ups. Such experiences diminish the rental experience, causing some renters to advise others to consider alternative property management services.

Ugly

A few reviews narrate particularly negative experiences with RPM Teyata, including allegations of unprofessional conduct and neglect of tenant rights. One reviewer described how issues such as mold and faulty plumbing were left unresolved, along with a lack of follow-up on these serious matters, suggesting a systemic failure in tenant care. Some reviews mention mishandled security deposits and manipulative behavior, causing tenants significant distress. These accounts paint a troubling picture of certain interactions with the management that involve unmet contractual obligations and communication breakdowns, leading to a severely tarnished impression of the company.
